    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static TemplatePicker.Parameters create()

      • setAutoColumns

        public final void setAutoColumns()
        Specify "auto" to have the template picker automatically calculate the number of columns based on the number of rows. Note: "auto" has no effect when grouping is enabled.

      • setColumns

        public final void setColumns(int columns)
        Parameters:
        columns - - Number of visible columns. Default is three.

      • setFeatureLayers

        public final void setFeatureLayers(FeatureLayer[] featureLayers)
        Parameters:
        featureLayers - - Array of input feature layers. The template picker displays the templates from each of the layer's in the array. Required to provide either featureLayers or items.

      • setGrouping

        public final void setGrouping(boolean grouping)
        Templates are grouped based on the containing feature layer. Grouping is automatically disabled when items are specified instead of featureLayers.
        Parameters:
        grouping - - Default is true.

      • addItem

        public final void addItem(java.lang.String label,
           Symbol symbol,
           java.lang.String description)
        Add to array of items. Use this option if you want to display a collection of symbols in the template picker.
        Parameters:
        label -
        symbol -
        description -

      • setMaxLabelLength

        public final void setMaxLabelLength(int maxLabelLength)
        Parameters:
        maxLabelLength - - Length of label description. Default is to display the entire label. If the specified maxLabelLength is less than the number of characters in the label description the description is truncated.

      • setAutoRows

        public final void setAutoRows()
        Specify "auto" to have the template picker automatically calculate the number of rows based on the number of columns. Note: "auto" has no effect when grouping is enabled.

      • setRows

        public final void setRows(int rows)
        Parameters:
        rows - - Number of visible rows. Default is four.

      • showTooltip

        public final void showTooltip(boolean showTooltip)
        Parameters:
        showTooltip - - Tooltip content contains the template name and description. Default is false.

      • setStyle

        public final void setStyle(java.lang.String style)
        Parameters:
        style - - HTML style attributes for the widget. Specify as css text
